snippet.title: Armed and Gelatinous | Arcade Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare yourself for something out of this world! Armed and Gelatinous: Arcade Edition!

Now Playing In Select Arcades
Seattle: Add-A-Ball - https://add-a-ball.com/
Portland: Ground Kontrol - https://groundkontrol.com/
New York City: Wonderville - https://www.wonderville.nyc/
Los Angeles: Two Bit Circus - https://twobitcircus.com/
Salt Lake City: Quarters Arcade Bar - https://www.quartersslc.com/
Ft. Lauderdale: Glitch Bar - https://www.glitchbar.com/
Pittsburgh: Barcadia - https://www.barcadiapgh.com/

Battle with up to 4 players in a variety of game modes including Blob Battle, Blob Blitz, and Blob Soccer. With fast-paced action this intense, it'll blow you away! Play as one of four adorable gelatinous blobs in fast-paced rounds of couch-competitive warfare in the far reaches of space! Load up on firepower, blast your opponents, and dash your way to victory! Level up by sticking to a variety of lethal weapons from planet Earth. But watch out! With each weapon collected, blobs grow larger in size becoming an easy target. Agile opponents can charge up a lethal dash attack and let it rip to take down even the most bloated blob in one hit! Customize rounds by selecting specific weapons and items as well as changing the win condition between timed, stock, or death match!

Join Us On Discord
http://discord.gg/blobsonline

TikTok | Instagram | Twitter
@armedgelatinous

Official Website
http://armedandgelatinous.com

Arcade Inquiries
http://arcade.armedandgelatinous.com

IMDB Credits
https://www.imdb.com/title/tt11946418

--
Video Directed by Dylan Kai Harris
http://dylankaiharris.com/
